TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable/HtmlTableRowControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

summary.span: 表示作为 控件的行的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are the rows of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示控件的对象的集合 。The class represents a collection of objects for an control. 可以使用方法在集合的末尾添加控件 ，也可以使用方法在集合中的指定索引位置添加控件 。Controls can be added at the end of the collection with the method, or at a specified index location in the collection with the method. 只能将类型的控件 添加到 集合中。Only controls of type can be added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个重写方法的自定义， 以便在将行添加到表时，这些行始终添加到表的行集合的开头。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Add (child As Control)

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象添加到集合。

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加的控件只能是 控件; 否则， 将引发异常。The added control can only be an control; otherwise, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个 重写方法的自定义集合， 以便在将行添加到表时，这些行始终添加到表的行集合的开头。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom collection that overrides the method so that when rows are added to a table, they are always added at the beginning of the table's row collection. 请注意，自定义 方法如何调用基类的 方法， `index` 参数等于0。Notice how the custom method calls the base class's method with the `index` parameter equal to 0. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/CS/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTable.HtmlTableRowControlCollection/VB/custom_htmltable_htmltablerowcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

exception.span: 已添加控件的类型必须为 。

span.span: The added control must be of type .
